name: Federation Against Copyright Theft
goal:
FACT is one of the world's first anti-piracy organisations, protecting the interests of members across the audiovisual sector since 1983.
Through diligent investigations we have been successful in taking action against counterfeiting and piracy globally, including prosecutions in the UK.
We also aim to support members in promoting legitimate content through education and public awareness and lobbying for better protection for creators and rights holders.
interests: Borders and Security, Competition, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Fraud prevention, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: Copyright, trade, digital economy, technology,customs, enforcement, justice, taxation and crime.
